refsect1.title: Descrizione
refsect1.para: pg_close closes down the non-persistent connection to a PostgreSQL database associated with the given connection resource. It returns &true;, if connection is a valid connection resource, otherwise it return &false;.

note.para: pg_close is not usually necessary, as non-persistent open links are automatically closed at the end of the script's execution. pg_close will not close persistent links generated by pg_pconnect.

refsect1.para: If there is open large object resource on the connection, do not close the connection before closing all large object resources.
